statements: DELETE FROM Reservations WHERE party_size > 4 AND cuisine_type = 'Italian';
DELETE FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-12-31' AND table_number = 5;
DELETE FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE table_location = 'Outdoor' AND cuisine_type = 'Italian';
DELETE FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_id = 101 AND customer_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE table_number IN (SELECT table_number FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date < '2022-01-01')
DELETE FROM menu_items WHERE item_name = 'Burger' AND item_price > 10.00;
